name: coral
description:
Shades of crimson and gold and silvery greys and blacks are intertwined together to form a light poncho adaptable for cooler days with a sweater underneath or for a warm Indian summer afternoon paired with a simple tank. Coral is perfect for exploring hills colored with autumn, a picnic by the lake, or any other adventure you choose.

name: celeste
description: Her skirt shimmering and glistening, she was the belle of the ball. Like stars sparkle in the velvety blackness of night, Celeste will have you feeling like a shimmering star. name: fleur
description: Fringe and hats, rouged cheeks and short bobs -- these are the things that are evoked by the nineteen twenties. Flowery and romantic, the Roaring Twenties were a period of change and sophistication. And while wearing Fleur, you, too, can be a part of that era. Cream colored, with lovely details and a romantic feel, it's hard not to feel fancy when this gorgeous skirt is part of your ensamble. name: coco
description: Clothes were strewn about her bedroom, hangers void of their dresses, as she dashed about, late for her engagement. "What to wear?", she thought, unable to find something that was the right mix of elegant and casual. Then her eyes settled on the little black dress. Accessorizing it with a necklace and heels, she was ready. But this little black dress, named in honor of Coco Chanel, isn't only for dressy occasions. Slip a cardigan and belt with it, and it's ready for a day at the office. Or pair it with a hat and scarf for a train ride through the Italian countryside. As long as a girl has her black dress, she is prepared for anything. see coco styled --- Order soon -- only a few available! Sizes available: S, M, L Live in a country other than the United States?
